Name:
USS St. George
HMS Pursuer
Fate:
Transferred to Royal Navy
Scrapped in 1946
Propulsion: Steam turbines, one shaft, 8,500 shp (6.3 MW)
Armament:
2 × 4"/50, 5"/38 or 5"/51 guns
8 × twin 40 mm Bofors
35 × single 20 mm Oerlikon
Operations:
Operation Tungsten
Invasion of Normandy
Operation Dragoon
